sentences.sContent: Therefore, people with bleeding disorders or taking anti-coagulant medication should consult with their doctor before taking fish oil supplements.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, people with bleeding disorders or taking anti-coagulant medication should consult with their doctor before taking fish oil supplements.
sentences.sCn: 因此，出血失调或者进行抗凝血治疗的人群，在使用鱼油补充剂前，需要先咨询他们的医生。

synos.tran: [助剂][建][化工]促凝剂；[药]凝血剂；凝结剂

words.tran: [助剂] 凝结剂；[化工] 凝结器

trans.tranOther: a substance that aids or produces coagulation
